data.message: I think it is really really wonderful for Facebook to do this cuz everybody needs to enjoy contact with others no matter if you can't see you can't hear whatever and I congratulate Facebook for doing this for everyone I myself I can't walk very far and at my age sometimes I can't see you very well my hearing is also getting a little bad but I enjoyed my Facebook account keep contact with friends all over the world and my family this way thank you very much Facebook

replies.message: Thanks for sharing, Christina. We're glad to hear you're staying connected on Facebook. -Jordan
This is one reason  I love Facebook  😁

Great idea for people who have seen before they became blind. Think about it, how do you describe the color red to such a person? A tree? east, bring them to one and let them touch it and so on. But color? Not possible...Great concept, regardless...
My husband has RP and is almost totally blind.  How can i get this?
Thank you Facebook!  People with disabilities deserve the same advantages as "typical" people have!
I would also like to extend my personal thanks to Facebook for this wonderful opportunity to feel a part of what sighted people do all the time. Finally, I will feel like I fit in thank you so much

I'm in the same boat as you are. Bless you. I am also homebound, 
 I'm lucky. Thanks Facebook.
When are they rolling it out to South Africa? Can't wait...
